mainTitle: Compliance Checklist for Data Protection & Risk Management
mainDescription: The Compliance Checklist for Data Protection ensures organizations adhere to data protection laws and safeguard personal data. It includes developing a data protection policy, conducting a data inventory, and establishing legal grounds for processing...
checklistSubtitle: Ensuring compliance with data protection laws is essential for safeguarding personal data.

checklist.title: Data Protection Policy:
checklist.desc: Develop and communicate a clear policy.

checklist.title: Legal Basis for Processing:
checklist.desc: Establish and document legal grounds for data processing.

checklist.title: Data Subject Rights:
checklist.desc: Establish procedures for data access, rectification, and erasure.

checklist.title: Data Security Measures:
checklist.desc: Implement technical and organizational security measures.

checklist.title: Regular Audits and Reviews:
checklist.desc: Conduct regular audits and use findings to improve practices.

checklist.title: Employee Training and Awareness:
checklist.desc: Provide ongoing training on data protection.

riskManagementDescription: Risk management involves identifying, assessing, and controlling threats to an organization's data security and privacy.

components.title: Monitoring and Review:
components.desc: Continuously monitor risks and update strategies.

steps.title: Conduct a Risk Assessment:
steps.desc: Perform and update risk assessments regularly.
